Freebird.certificationStatus: You do not have a valid Jumpseat certification. Please take a test using 'Take a Test' link.

Question1.q1: 1. Excluding routine traffic citations (DWI/DUI matters are not considered routine traffic violations), have you been formally charged with or convicted with a crime in the last 10 years?

Question2.q2: 2. In the last 10 years, have you been convicted of any crime?

Question3.q3: 3. Are you presently under indictment, or a defendant, or do you have charges pending against you in any criminal proceeding?
